name: Animal Antics
description:
Animal Antics is a platformer where you play as animal characters in 4 zones, each with 5 levels to complete.Progress through the 20 levels by dodging hostile enemies and solving puzzles. Lives are unlimited with the goal to complete all the levels with the minimum amount of deaths.The levels can be completed in any order with the lower levels being the easiest.
Controls are
  • Left Arrow to move left
  • Right Arrow to move right
  • Space or Up Arrow to jump
  • R Key to reset level if you trap yourself
  • E Key to escape level and try another
